pkgmetadata.longdescription: XMRig is a high performance, open source, cross platform RandomX, KawPow, CryptoNight and AstroBWT unified CPU/GPU miner and RandomX benchmark. Official binaries are available for Windows, Linux, macOS and FreeBSD. (This package only supports CPU mining.)

use.flag: Use hwloc to get hardward topology.
Enable MSR mod and 1st-gen Ryzen fix
Enable CryptoNight-Lite, CryptoNight-Heavy and CryptoNight-Pico algorithm families
Enable secure access to JIT memory
